translation.en: [man] Last year, Americans purchased upwards of $3 billion in greeting cards.
translation.es: El año pasado,los estadounidenses gastaron más de $3000 millonesen tarjetas de felicitaciones.
Las bodas, el romance,los agradecimientos y los cumpleaños

translation.en: with major holidays providing steady profits.
translation.es: y las fiestas más importantesbrindan ganancias constantes.

translation.en: It's a thriving industry where it's often said
translation.es: POR UN FUTURO MEJOR Es una industria en crecimiento, QUE TE MEJORES donde se suele decir

translation.en: the right card can make the day.
translation.es: que la tarjeta correctapuede alegrarte el día.
Así que, sí, soy un poeta,

translation.en: if you've got to label me.
I could see her pupils dilate.

translation.es: La tenía comiendo de mi mano.

translation.en: "Well, if you're so famous, what have you written?"
I just shrugged, then I said...
translation.es: Yo me encogí de hombros y dije...

translation.en: "Only the top Valentine's Day card for the last three years in a row."
translation.es: "Solo la tarjeta de San Valentínmás vendida de los últimos tres años".

translation.en: At what point did the poor woman find out you're a hack?
translation.es: ¿Y cuándo se enteróla pobre de que eras un fiasco?

translation.en: Sadly, it was but a single night of sweated bliss.
translation.es: Por desgracia, fue una sola nochede dicha y transpiración.

translation.en: So she had some taste, then. God, no. She was a fan of your work.
translation.es: - Entonces no tenía tan mal gusto.- Dios, no. Admiraba tu trabajo.

translation.en: By the way, 90% of all cards are purchased by women.
translation.es: Por cierto, las mujeres compranel 90% de las tarjetas.

translation.en: You better get with the program. You're no Taft.
translation.es: Más te vale actualizarte. No eres Taft.

translation.en: Taft, he was... he was great, right?

translation.es: Solo hubo uno mejor que él.

translation.en: He quit cards to write novels.
translation.es: Dejó las tarjetas para ser novelista.

translation.en: Novels are for people who can't edit themselves.
translation.es: Las novelas son para quienesno pueden editarse solos.

translation.en: Cards are still the ultimate challenge.
translation.es: Las tarjetas siguen siendoel máximo reto.

translation.en: Sweet talk will get you nowhere.
translation.es: Adularme no te llevará a ningún lado.

translation.en: Mr. Wentworth, Mr. Styvesan wants to see you.
translation.es: Señor Wentworth,el señor Styvesan lo quiere ver.

translation.en: I was just about to ask for a meeting.
Well, who's to say it's not good news?
translation.es: ¿Cómo saben que no son buenas noticias?

translation.en: Styvesan, I'm so glad you made the time. Got some great ones here.
translation.es: Styvesan, qué bueno que me recibas.Tengo muy buenas opciones.

translation.en: I've been missing you. Why did you leave me?"
-That's kind of bleak. -Ray, why don't you just--
"Honey, come back. It was my fault."
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no...?- "Cariño, regresa. Fue mi culpa".

translation.en: I'm thinking a whole line of "I Regrets."
-Could there be a song chip in there? -No.
Playing a sad song or something?
No song chips, no glitter-- just the truth, all right?
translation.es: Nada de chips ni brillos.Solo la verdad, ¿sí?

translation.en: 'Cause that's what cards have been missing.
translation.es: Porque eso les falta a las tarjetas.

translation.en: Besides, I've heard complaints about the glitter.
translation.es: Además, muchos se quejande la brillantina.

translation.en: You know, I campaigned for a stronger glue about two years ago.
translation.es: Hace dos años hice campañapara mejorar el pegamento.

translation.en: -Ray, why don't you have a seat. -Let's go retro.
Could be hip. I'm thinking... dime trees.
translation.es: Podría tener onda.Propongo... árboles de monedas.

translation.en: Girl opens the card, there's ten dimes for her.
Could be great for someone you love who you owe money to.
translation.es: Podría ser genial si la amasy le debes dinero.
Bueno, estás bien. Algo más elegante.
Monedas de $0,25. Es tu idea. Bien.

translation.en: You want to put quarters in a romance card.
I'm gonna have to let you go.
We have machines behind you that fold cards, Ray.
translation.es: Las máquinas que tienes detrásdoblan tarjetas, Ray.

translation.en: Faster than a machine? Faster than 300 cards a minute?
translation.es: ¿Más rápido que la máquina?¿Más de 300 tarjetas por minuto?

translation.en: I'm gonna have to take your guild card.
Ray, why don't you, um, get your stuff some other time, okay?
translation.es: Ray, ven a buscar tus cosasalgún otro día, ¿sí?

translation.en: We'll keep it safe for you.
What are you looking at? Get back to work.
And somebody water this damn thing. My daughter gave it to me.
translation.es: Y que alguien riegue esta porquería.Me la regaló mi hija.

translation.en: Too many things dying around here.
My publisher says it has to be 120 pages, minimum.
translation.es: Según mi editor,tiene que tener 120 páginas, mínimo.

translation.en: Actually, I'm thinking of getting back into the card game.
translation.es: Estoy pensando en regresar a las tarjetas.

translation.en: You know, you're honest, and, uh...

translation.es: Bien por ti.Porque la cacería es la clave.

translation.en: 'Cause the chase is the key. The chase.
translation.es: Bien por ti.Porque la cacería es la clave. La cacería.

translation.en: I got a wife, I'm settled in,
but I don't have that-- that drive,
You, the love of your life left you.
translation.es: A ti te dejó el amor de tu vida.
Tienes un vacío en tu interior.

translation.en: I never thought of it like that.
translation.es: Jamás lo pensé de ese modo.
Que se vayan a la mierda.

translation.en: [male vocalist] ♪ Well, I searched for my name ♪
[man, on television] And on my left,
I've got twenty bucks in my pocket,

translation.es: son para el vagabundo que quede en pie.

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Ray, I know you're in there!
[newscaster] And the giraffe baby will be at the city zoo for just two more weeks,
translation.es: Y la jirafa bebéestará en el zoológico dos semanas más,

translation.en: so you'd better get down there.
translation.es: así que no se la pierdan.

translation.en: The governor's office is about to make an announcement,
translation.es: El ayuntamientoestá por hacer un anuncio que,

translation.en: one he says will give the greeting card industry a boost.
translation.es: según el gobernador,impulsará al rubro de las tarjetas.

translation.en: Have you noticed the flowers I planted?"
They don't heal so fast. I can't ply my trade.
translation.es: No se cura tan rápido. No puedo desempeñar mi labor.

translation.en: And you can't write with the other fingers?
You're gonna have to figure out a way to pay me.
translation.es: Tendrás que encontrar el modo de pagarme.

translation.en: You want me to blow you?
Hey, watch what you're saying. There's children present.
translation.es: Cuidado con lo que dices,hay niños presentes.

translation.en: I have to watch him for my damn sister while she goes to school
translation.es: Tengo que cuidárselo a mi hermanamientras va a aprender

translation.en: to learn how to clean teeth,
and it's against the law for me to take him to the track.
translation.es: y es ilegal llevarlo al hipódromo.

translation.en: And I can't push him off the roof.
translation.es: Y no lo puedo tirar de la terraza.

translation.en: I thought he'd be afraid of you.
Come here, 'jito. I want you to meet Uncle Ray.
translation.es: Ven, hijito. Te presento al tío Ray.

translation.en: Consider yourself lucky. Trucks never leave you.
translation.es: Considérate afortunado.Los camiones no te abandonan.

translation.en: But they break down all the time. That's what my uncle says.
translation.es: Pero siempre se rompen. Eso dice mi tío.

translation.en: Except he says they break down all the damn time.
translation.es: Pero dice:"Se rompen todo el maldito tiempo".

translation.en: [Cathy] Told him you'd be here tonight.
The same. Look, I got a business proposition for you.
translation.es: Todo igual.Te tengo una propuesta laboral.

translation.en: What have you been working on?
some thank-yous, "I'm sorries." I'm-- I'm branching out.
That's great. Listen, I got a little side project going.
I need you to write a card.
A romance card, a great one.
Like the ones you used to write.
And instead of using words like "my love" or "my wife,"
translation.es: Y, en vez de usar palabrascomo "mi amor" o "mi esposa",

translation.en: I need you to use the word...
Listen, I... I can't promise anything, you know.
translation.es: Mira, no te puedo prometer nada.

translation.en: There's good money here for you.
I'll pay you triple freelance rate.
translation.es: Te pagaré el triple de tu tarifa.

translation.en: I know I said a lot of nasty things about you.
translation.es: Sé que dije cosas muy feas sobre ti.

translation.en: I just want you to know I was just being really, really honest and...
translation.es: Solo quiero que sepasque estaba siendo muy... sincero y...

translation.en: Hey, I might need to get into the office,
translation.es: Quizá necesite ir a la oficina

translation.en: get some of my old notes and such, okay?
Make sure you use the back door, the one with the broken lock.
translation.es: Usa la puerta de atrás,la del cerrojo roto.

translation.en: So put the fuckin' money away.
You know, if you had it, then you can get it back.
translation.es: Si lo tenías, lo puedes recuperar.

translation.en: Do you remember the first card you ever wrote?
Was it for your mom, or...?
It had a heart on it, and, uh...
What did it say inside, do you remember?
Come back soon. Your son, Raymond."
translation.es: Regresa pronto. De tu hijo, Raymond".

translation.en: Come back? Where'd she go, on a trip, or...?
She only had a few weeks left to live.
translation.es: Solo le quedaban unas semanas de vida.

translation.en: Like I was supposed to understand that.
I just thought she'd be coming back.
I think they buried her with it.
translation.es: Creo que la enterraron con ella.

translation.en: [Madsen] Okay, y'all ready to get your poems on?
Please stick around. There's more to come.
translation.es: No se vayan, aún hay mucho más.

translation.en: So, Ray, uh, what'd you think?
Well, your motorcycle tipped over on you.
translation.es: Se te dio vuelta la motocicleta.

translation.en: There was more to it than just that,
but, yeah, that was at the core of it.
translation.es: pero sí, esa era la idea.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, she loved it more than I did, but...
translation.es: A ella más que a mí pero...

translation.en: Yeah, he writes, too. Or wrote, I guess.
translation.es: Él también escribe. O escribía, supongo.

translation.en: Big Ray here used to be the best--
the Bill Shakespeare of romance cards.
translation.es: el Shakespeare de las tarjetas románticas.

translation.en: His wife left him for... Harold Lamb.
translation.es: Su esposa lo dejó por... Harold Lamb.

translation.en: Oh, I know who Harold Lamb is.
Oh, yeah. So you know the guy that draws Optimistic Owl.
translation.es: Sí, el que dibuja La Lechuza Optimista.

translation.en: Ladies, um, do you guys want to get a booth,
maybe, um, talk about some poetry?
Bro, lose the bitter act. It ain't gonna get you laid.
translation.es: Viejo, anímate. Así no tendrás chicas.

translation.en: Please. Tell me how to get laid.
translation.es: Por favor, explícame cómo se hace.

translation.en: In other news today, Governor Speakman made a big announcement.
translation.es: El gobernador Speakmanhizo un gran anuncio.

translation.en: Listen up, everybody. The governor's on.
Today I am pleased to announce
the state of California will establish a new holiday:
translation.es: que el estado de Californiacreará una nueva festividad:

translation.en: an occasion for men, and women as well,
translation.es: para que los hombres,y también las mujeres,

translation.en: to tell their favorite lady friend just how much she means to them.
translation.es: le digan a su media naranjacuánto significa para ellos.

translation.en: This was my niece Coco's idea.
translation.es: Fue idea de mi sobrina Coco.

translation.en: We're going to hold a contest
to see who can write the most romantic card
translation.es: para ver quién escribela tarjeta más romántica
para dar inicio a la nueva festividad.

translation.en: "In an effort to inject new blood into the failing greeting card industry,
translation.es: Para impulsar a la sufrida industriade las tarjetas,

translation.en: the governor is limiting contestants to amateurs and...

translation.es: Marqué el párrafo para que lo vieras.

translation.en: Look, maybe it was providence you got fired.
translation.es: Quizá fue una suerteque te despidieran.

translation.en: You know, what I loved about your class is that you always made us write.
translation.es: Lo que más me gustaba de tu claseera que nos hacías escribir.

translation.en: You know, actually write in class.
Yeah, that was so I could write. I know. It was something to see.
translation.es: - Sí, para que yo pudiera escribir.- Ya sé. Era digno de ver.

translation.en: I want to see you do it again.
Truth is, I haven't written anything good in three years. I...
translation.es: La verdad, hace tres añosque no escribo nada bueno.

translation.en: Gosh, that is-- that's a bummer.
Wonder what could have happened three years ago that would have
I wonder if it was maybe when your wife left you for another guy.
translation.es: ¿Que tu esposa te dejara por otro, quizá?

translation.en: It's like talking to one of my seventh-graders.
translation.es: Es como hablarcon alumnos de 12 años.

translation.en: Look, I only see her when it's legally mandated.
translation.es: Solo la veocuando hay una obligación legal.

translation.en: You're not still picking up the cat, are you?
Oh, shit. What day is it?
You hate cats. You're not an animal person.
translation.es: Si los odias.No te gustan los animales.

translation.en: Thanks for the advice. Come on, Denny.
Well, I guess I should invite you in.
translation.es: Creo que debo invitarte a pasar.

translation.en: That's okay. I like it warm.
I don't know if you've heard, but they're doing a spin-off of one of my--
translation.es: No sé si sabíaspero harán una nueva serie de mi...

translation.en: Say, I've been meaning to ask you, uh, do you get a cut
translation.es: Lo siento, quería preguntarte,¿te dan una parte

translation.en: off those wonderful rip-offs I see of your work all over town?
translation.es: de esas maravillosas imitacionesde tu trabajo que hay en la ciudad?

translation.en: Sure, you must have seen 'em. Uh, the owl's getting the B.J.
translation.es: Debes haberlas visto. Se la maman a la lechuza.

translation.en: Or he's biting the head off your chicken character.
translation.es: O le muerde la cabeza a la pollita.

translation.en: Yeah. You must have sued those guys, right?
Oh, there's one where two owls are pissing in each other's mouths.
translation.es: En una, dos lechuzasorinan en la boca de la otra.

translation.en: I must have seen that on 12 trucks today.
translation.es: Creo que hoy la vi en como 12 camionetas.

translation.en: Oh. If it isn't the only two men I've ever slept with.
translation.es: Vaya, los únicos hombrescon los que me acosté.

translation.en: I see you still haven't lost your talent for pissing people off.
translation.es: No perdiste el talentopara irritar a los demás.

translation.en: Tell me, when you make love, does he make you wear an owl costume?
translation.es: Dime, cuando hacen el amor,¿te hace disfrazarte de lechuza?

translation.en: Or does he wear the costume?
No one's in an owl costume.
Here's Tony. Give him his medicine and have him back on Saturday.
translation.es: Aquí está Tony. Dale su medicinay tráemelo el sábado.

translation.en: I don't know why the judge just didn't make you keep him.
translation.es: No sé por qué el juezno te obligó a quedártelo.

translation.en: Because you insisted that we share custody.
Why did you leave me for this cardboard cutout?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me dejastepor este muñeco de papel?

translation.en: For a romance card writer, you weren't very romantic.
translation.es: Para ser escritor de tarjetas de amor,no eras muy romántico.

translation.en: I never brought my work home with me.
translation.es: Jamás traje el trabajo a casa.

translation.en: I need the kid. Pays the rent.
translation.es: Necesito al chico. Paga la renta.

translation.en: Can I have a vodka soda, please?
I saw it on the back of a truck once.
translation.es: Una vez lo vi en una camioneta.

translation.en: You're not Ray Wentworth, are you? The card guy?
translation.es: No eres Ray Wentworth, ¿no?¿El de las tarjetas?

translation.en: That's all. I just love saying 'Dear wife.'
translation.es: Eso es todo.Me encanta decir 'Querida esposa'.

translation.en: I'm a weirdo for cards. That's why I come here.
translation.es: Me encantan las tarjetas.Por eso vengo aquí.

translation.en: How many cats do you have?
[Madsen] Okay, y'all ready to get your poems on?
This first one is about my jet ski.
translation.es: El primero es sobre mi moto de agua.

translation.en: [Karen] For a romance card writer, you weren't very romantic.
translation.es: Para ser escritor de tarjetas de amor,no eras romántico.

translation.en: [Buddy] You gotta forget about Karen. You gotta let her go.
translation.es: Olvida a Karen. Tienes que olvidarla.

translation.en: [Madsen] Big Ray here used to be the best,
the Bill Shakespeare of romance cards.
translation.es: El Shakespeare de las tarjetas románticas.

translation.en: [Buddy] You're not still picking up the cat, are you?
"I'm with you in hard times especially.
Look for me in your heart.
That is so sad, don't you think?
That's a person who's asking for so little.
translation.es: Esa es una personaque pide demasiado poco.

translation.en: You still got that awesome tattoo?

translation.es: Sí, aún no se ha desgastado.

translation.en: Yeah. Seeing how awful these are is a real pick-me-up.
translation.es: Sí. Ver estos desastresme ha levantado el ánimo.

translation.en: You don't walk around all the time in a red smock with a name tag?
translation.es: ¿No vas por la vida con un guardapolvoy un cartel con tu nombre?

translation.en: They bum me out with their upbeat attitude.
All they ever do is make me feel more alone.
translation.es: Siempre me hacen sentir más sola.

translation.en: So, why did you quit writing?
I just quit being good at it.
Yeah, well, you'll get it back.
You gotta have the feelings first, and then you can write about them.
translation.es: Necesitas los sentimientos,para luego escribir sobre ellos.

translation.en: Hey, um, do you think that--
I like to get that shit over with.
translation.es: Me saqué esa parte de encima.

translation.en: [Ray sings along] ♪ And I don't know how you do it ♪
Who did this to you? What are you doing here?
What, are you working for Paper Hearts?
I think very highly of you, too.
You've heard the expression 'penny for your thoughts.'
translation.es: Conoces la expresión'Un centavo por lo que piensas'.

translation.en: Well, here are ten dimes for your thoughts.
translation.es: Bueno, aquí tienes diez monedasde $0,10 por lo que piensas.

translation.en: Signed, the numb-nuts that's dating you."
translation.es: Firma, el chiflado que sale contigo".

translation.en: I'm Detective fucking Miller, fucking Homicide, that's who I am.
translation.es: Soy el detective Miller carajode Homicidios, ese soy yo.

translation.en: What kind of cards you write, Wentworth?
So every time I forget to give
translation.es: Entonces, cada vez que olvido regalarle

translation.en: one of your mushy-ass cards to my girl,
translation.es: una de tus tarjetas baratas a mi novia,

translation.en: I get cut off for a month.
Perhaps if you were well-endowed, you wouldn't need one of my cards.
translation.es: Quizá, si estuvieras bien dotado,no necesitarías mis tarjetas.

translation.en: You punched me in the throat!
One of your butt buddies was found in the river this morning
translation.es: Uno de tus amiguitos carnalesapareció en el río

translation.en: with a bunch of water where his internal organs used to be.
translation.es: con agua en vez de órganos internos.

translation.en: Shouldn't I be asking you that?
-You think that I--? -He was your competition, right?
You got somebody watching over you.
translation.es: Tienes a alguien que te protege.

translation.en: You get out your feather pen,
and you write a nice little card
that'll open my girlfriend's legs again.
translation.es: que vuelva a abrirlelas piernas a mi novia.

translation.en: I might consider dropping your bloody shirt at the dry cleaners.
And tossing that blade in the river.
translation.es: Y arroje el cuchillo al río.

translation.en: [newscaster] Police have identified the body as one Orwell G. Taft,
translation.es: La policía identificó el cadáverde Orwell G. Taft,

translation.en: Nothing more is known at this time.
translation.es: Por ahora, no se sabe nada más.

translation.en: He probably had a second family somewhere.
Or he was an S&M junkie,
liked to be whipped and kicked around
translation.es: y le gustaba que lo azotaran

translation.en: or held underwater to get his jollies.
translation.es: o lo excitaba que lo ahogaran.

translation.en: Why is everybody so much more depressed than usual?
translation.es: ¿Por qué estánmás deprimidos de lo normal?

translation.en: Jeez Louise, Mr. Wentworth, did you get into a car accident?
It hit me in the face. Somebody's shoe.
translation.es: Me dio en la cara. El zapato de alguien.

translation.en: They found him floating in the river this morning.
translation.es: Apareció flotando en el río esta mañana.

translation.en: Another one bites the dust, huh?
-Hey. -Oh. Sorry. Something happened to my face.
translation.es: Lo siento, me pasó algo en la cara.

translation.en: Do you want to drink about it?
I think I'd better not tonight.
Um, I... I brought you something.
I hope it comforts your face.
translation.es: Espero que te consuele la cara.

translation.en: Uh, and my phone number's on the bottom of it.
translation.es: Mi teléfono está anotado en la base.

translation.en: My sister dragged his ass back to Chicago,
translation.es: Mi hermana se lo llevó a Chicago
para molestar a mi otro hermano.

translation.en: Oh-- uh, I got an idea.
How about a yard sale, then?
You can put price tags on everything here.
translation.es: Puedes ponerle precioa todo lo que hay aquí.

translation.en: Uh, this couch. My bed frame.
That's a thousand bucks right there.
I got all this small stuff, like the kitchenware
translation.es: Y hay cosas chiquitas, como los utensilios

translation.en: You put all that on one card table right in the middle of the room
translation.es: Pon todo en una mesaen medio de la sala

translation.en: and a little sign that says,

translation.es: "Lo que hay en esta mesapor cien dólares".

translation.en: I mean, well, name your price.
Well, see, I still-- I get to live here while it goes on.
It's kind of like a living showroom.
Did you hear about that writer who, uh--
Well, he didn't swim very good.
Very well. He didn't swim very well.
translation.es: Nadador. No era un gran nadador.

translation.en: You teach English with that mouth?
I think it has something to do with this, uh...
translation.es: Creo que tiene algo que ver con el...

translation.en: They're killing people over a new holiday?
Follow the money. It's-- I saw it in a movie once.
translation.es: Que sigas el dinero.Una vez lo vi en una película.

translation.en: Hey, but if you're actually worried, you know, you can move out to the 'burbs.
translation.es: Pero, si estás preocupado,te puedes mudar a los suburbios.

translation.en: Get you a job teaching Driver's Ed. Speed things up.
translation.es: Puedo darte trabajo de instructor,acelerará el proceso.

translation.en: [minister] And we have come to the moment in our service
translation.es: Llegamos al momento de la ceremonia

translation.en: where we can go no farther,
translation.es: en que no queda otra alternativa,

translation.en: and stand on the edge of a chasm,
[minister] Our God, we are grateful that Orwell...
Guess his novel wasn't working out, so he gave up.
translation.es: - La novela no funcionaba y se rindió.- Mierda.

translation.en: [minister] And we know that he is wrapped tight...
I think he was writing a card for this new holiday.
translation.es: Hacía una tarjetapara la nueva festividad.

translation.en: What are you--? No one's getting killed over this, Ray.
translation.es: No matan a nadie por eso, Ray.

translation.en: We're talking about a card here.
[minister] ...grateful that he now sings with angels...
...wrapped tight in the arms and the bosom of Abraham...
translation.es: Y sabemos que está en brazosde Abraham...

translation.en: I don't know, I just work here.
translation.es: No sé, yo solo trabajo aquí.

translation.en: It's professional curiosity. Taft and I worked together.
translation.es: Es curiosidad profesional.Solía trabajar con Taft.

translation.en: Your husband was the writer I always measured myself against.
translation.es: Tu esposo era el escritorcon el que siempre me comparaba.

translation.en: And I always came up short.
won me over with a card.
I'm afraid I wasn't the greatest prize.
translation.es: Pero yo no era un gran premio.

translation.en: Did you attend the company picnics, huh? Christmas party?
translation.es: ¿Ibas a los pícnics de la empresa? ¿A Navidad?

translation.en: Right. Now, wait, you're in the greetings industry.
translation.es: Claro. Y estás en la industriade las tarjetas.

translation.en: Romance, purely. I don't have time for that other shit.
translation.es: Solo las románticas. No tengo tiempo para las otras idioteces.

translation.en: You tell me, was he writing a card for this new holiday?
translation.es: MI AMOR, TE AMO ¿Estaba escribiendouna tarjeta para la nueva festividad?
Los sentimientos le salían a borbotones.

translation.en: -Who was he working for? -Gundy, of course.

translation.es: ¡Llegarás lejos! Dylan Gundy El dueño de Saludos AAAAA.

translation.en: No, come on. Not Robert Gundy.
Dillon, his brother, the owner of Paper Hearts.
translation.es: Dillon, su hermano,de Corazones de Papel.

translation.en: I've just been feeling so lonely,
without Orwell's voice buzzing in the air, you know?
translation.es: sin la voz de Orwell zumbando en el aire.

translation.en: -Clomping around. -Listen, can I use your back door?
Yeah, of your house. Can I use it?
translation.es: Sí, la de tu casa. ¿Puedo usarla?

translation.en: What are you doing with the lady, huh?

translation.es: Esto se pone cada vez más raro.

translation.en: I don't have to tell you anything. Now, where's the card?
translation.es: No tengo por qué decirte nada. ¿Dónde está la tarjeta?

translation.en: Get to it, or I might have to find my favorite bloody shirt.
translation.es: Hazlo o tendré que encontrarmi camisa ensangrentada favorita.

translation.en: Take a picture. It'll last longer.
translation.es: Toma una foto. Así durará más.

translation.en: We wouldn't care if you was, mister.
translation.es: No nos importaría si lo fuera,señor.

translation.en: I'm Betcher. This here's Adolph Haggert.
translation.es: Yo soy Betcher. Este es Adolph Haggert.

translation.en: Call him Sonnyboy. He don't like Adolph no more.
translation.es: Dile Sonnyboy, ya no le gusta Adolph.

translation.en: I spent two years in a maximum security prison
translation.es: Pasé dos añosen una prisión de máxima seguridad

translation.en: for a hate crime I did not commit.
translation.es: por un delito de odio que no cometí.

translation.en: It was planned as a hate crime.
I couldn't get that fucking cross into the ground.
translation.es: Pero no pude clavarla maldita cruz en el suelo.

translation.en: It's a lot tougher than it looks.
translation.es: Es más difícil de lo que parece.

translation.en: hating a whole race of folks, now that's an awful lot of work.
translation.es: ...odiar a toda una razalleva demasiado esfuerzo.

translation.en: So you don't hate anyone now?
So, who do you hate now?
You know what them are, fancy man?
Them's people think they're better than other people. I got news for you: They ain't!
translation.es: Los que se creen mejores que los demás.Pues te tengo noticias. ¡No lo son!

translation.en: Nobody's better than nobody, that's our motto these days.
translation.es: "Nadie es mejor que nadie",es nuestro lema ahora.

translation.en: And if you think you is, we'll fuck you up till you isn't.
translation.es: Si crees lo eres,te joderemos hasta convencerte.

translation.en: Good to finally meet you, Mr. Wentworth.
My wrist is still a little broken.
translation.es: Aún tengo la muñeca algo rota.

translation.en: My goodness. Your lip-- looks like fresh blood.
translation.es: Dios mío. Parece tener sangre fresca en el labio.

translation.en: I hope you don't mind watching me eat. I'm famished.
translation.es: Espero que no le moleste verme comer.Estoy famélico.

translation.en: Can I offer you a beer?
A beer for Mr. Wentworth, please.
Napoleon gave it to his mother after she had a tumor removed from her ankle.
translation.es: Napoleón se la dio a su madrecuando le extirparon un tumor.

translation.en: It's French, and it translates into, "Feel better."
translation.es: Está en francés y significa:"Que te mejores".

translation.en: She died two days after receiving it.
translation.es: Murió dos días después de recibirla.

translation.en: Sit down, Mr. Wentworth, let's talk.

translation.es: Es el dueño de Saludos AAAAA.

translation.en: And Paper Hearts. No, no, no. No, that belongs to my brother, Dilly.
translation.es: - Y Corazones de Papel.- No, esa es de mi hermano, Dilly.

translation.en: Well, Mr. Wentworth, they tell me that you were Card Writer of the Year
translation.es: Bueno, señor Wentworth, dicenque fue el Escritor de Tarjetas del Año

translation.en: Also that you're divorced, you live alone,
translation.es: Y que está divorciado, vive solo

translation.en: and you like to watch Bumfights.
translation.es: y le gusta mirar Peleas de Vagabundos.

translation.en: What can you see in them, I wonder!
translation.es: Me pregunto qué les ve de especial.

translation.en: They make me feel better somehow.
translation.es: No sé, me hacen sentir mejor.

translation.en: He was writing a card for your brother's company.
translation.es: Escribía una tarjetapara la empresa de su hermano.

translation.en: They found him floating facedown in the river.
translation.es: Apareció flotando boca abajo en el río.

translation.en: Oh, yes, yes. It was tragic.
Styvesan told me that he was a very skilled writer,
translation.es: Styvesan me dijoque era un escritor muy talentoso,

translation.en: Said there was only one ever better.
translation.es: Dijo que solo había uno mejor que él.

translation.en: Yeah, well, his wife is distraught.
Someone ought to send her a card.
That is a hefty accusation, Mr. Wentworth.
translation.es: Esa es una acusación considerable,señor Wentworth.

translation.en: Perhaps you should take that up with the police.
translation.es: Quizá debería hablar con la policía.

translation.en: The word is, you have a sweetheart, Mr. Wentworth.
translation.es: Dicen que tiene novia, señor Wentworth.

translation.en: Detective Miller. He works for me on the side.
translation.es: El detective Millertambién trabaja para mí.

translation.en: I thought Styvesan worked for you. Among many others.
translation.es: - Creí que Styvesan trabajaba para usted.- Entre muchos otros.

translation.en: That's good, that's very good. I mean, after all,
translation.es: Está muy bien. Después de todo,

translation.en: you need to feel the feelings before you can write about them.
translation.es: necesitas experimentar los sentimientosantes de escribir sobre ellos.

translation.en: So I write the card for her and I give it to you. That doesn't seem fair.
translation.es: Le escribo una tarjetay se la doy a usted. No es justo.

translation.en: Well, my father used to say, "Fair is where you end up."
translation.es: Mi padre decía: "Justo es nuestro fin".

translation.en: I have a sixth sense about these things, Mr. Wentworth.
translation.es: Tengo un sexto sentidosobre estas cosas, Sr. Wentworth.

translation.en: You've been a fool for love before.
translation.es: No es la primera vez que se enamora.

translation.en: You've got the gene for it.
No, I'm a cynic. You're cynical. There's a difference.
translation.es: Yo soy cínico, usted es escéptico.No es lo mismo.

translation.en: I never believed in the first place, but you,
you wake up every morning disappointed to find the world the way it is
translation.es: ...despierta cada mañana decepcionadode encontrar el mundo como está,
Rupert, acompañaal señor Wentworth a la salida.

translation.en: I mean, they're made out of real... plastic.
But, uh, if you have a magic act, they can--
translation.es: Si tienes un espectáculode magia, pueden...

translation.en: I can water them with soda pop.
They're beautiful. They-- they smell funny.
Here you go. Look at this.
Oh, that's my, uh, collection of ugly purses.
translation.es: Esa es mi colección de bolsos feos.

translation.en: Baby shoes. Um... who do those belong to?
Yeah, those-- those are actually mine.
translation.es: ¿De quién son? En realidad, son míos.

translation.en: Last couple of years, I've been...
translation.es: En los últimos años, he estado...

translation.en: looking for those feelings, and, uh...
Why don't you write me a card and tell me all about it?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me escribes una tarjetay me lo cuentas?

translation.en: Sorry for calling you so early.
You kidding me? I've been up since 5:30 a.m.
How many fish did you catch?
Ray! Tell me you got something for me!
I did it. It's the best I ever wrote. It-- it's pithy and it's sweet.
translation.es: Lo hice. Es la mejor tarjeta de mi vida. Es dulce y concisa.

translation.en: It's got heart, and after this, I'm done, okay?
translation.es: Tiene corazón.Después de esto, se acabó, ¿sí?

translation.en: Yeah. The real one's right here. You can't have it.
translation.es: Sí, la verdadera está aquí. No te la daré.

translation.en: You can't have it! I didn't write it for you.
translation.es: No te la daré. No la escribí para ti.

translation.en: I'm gonna give it to the person I wrote it for,
translation.es: Es para la mujer a quien se la escribí

translation.en: and you can suck my dick, okay?
translation.es: y tú me la puedes chupar, ¿sí?

translation.en: Hey. You up for some spaghetti and booze?
I know this is impromptu, but this is...
translation.es: Sé que no te avisé pero esto es...
"Bebida alcohólica con sabor a champaña". Es...

translation.en: -Ray, I-I don't think-- -Don't worry. It's done.
translation.es: - Ray, no creo...- Descuida. Ya la terminé.

translation.en: I'm not giving it to anyone. Just you.
translation.es: No se la daré a nadie. Solo a ti.

translation.en: Because I wrote it for you.
I'd love a gander at that, if you're done.
translation.es: Me encantaría ver eso,si ya terminaste.

translation.en: So, it was a chick that did the trick, huh?
translation.es: Así que finalmente funcionócon una chica, ¿no?

translation.en: Well, Gundy figured one of us would get it.
translation.es: Gundy supuso que uno de los doslo lograría.

translation.en: Nice job, huh? Well, beauty wins. Whatever.
translation.es: Buen trabajo, ¿no? Bueno, la belleza gana.

translation.en: All right, let's see what gay sentence turned on the lady's faucets.
translation.es: A ver qué frase gayencendió a la señorita.

translation.en: -Where's the damn card? -You got it, fancy pants?
He's still got it in his mind.
translation.es: Aún la tiene en la cabeza.

translation.en: Hey, what are we waiting for?
You know, I got a card when I got out of prison one time,
translation.es: Una vez me dieron una tarjetacuando salí de la cárcel,

translation.en: with brains, muscles, looks, and girls chasing you...
translation.es: con esa cabeza, músculos, bellezay tantas chicas tras de ti...

translation.en: Styvesan told the boss that you did have it.
translation.es: Styvesan le dijo al jefe que sí la tenías.

translation.en: He said that you said that it was your best card ever.
translation.es: Dijo que dijiste que erala mejor que habías escrito.

translation.en: Ask the woman. She saw it.
translation.es: Pregúntenle a ella. Ella la vio.

translation.en: Then you're gonna have to say what was on it.
translation.es: Vas a tener que decirnos qué decía.

translation.en: Oh, lookit. Hey, what's the worst place you can get a papercut?
translation.es: - Mira.- ¿Cuál es la peor cortada con papel?

translation.en: Ooh, how about the pee hole?
-That's it, the eye. -Yeah, right on the eyeball.
translation.es: - Sí, en el ojo.- Justo ahí.

translation.en: Tell 'em what the card said. Just tell them. Why does it even matter?
translation.es: - Justo en el ojo.- Diles qué decía. ¿Qué importa?

translation.en: 'Cause. You got paid to be with me.
translation.es: Importa. Porque te pagaron para estar conmigo.

translation.en: You know what that makes you? A whore.
Oh, language! There's a child present.
translation.es: Cuidado con esa boca. Hay un niño.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm afraid it's Take Your Daughter To Work Day,
translation.es: Lo siento, pero es el díade los hijos en el trabajo

translation.en: and I guess I take even the most off-brand holiday seriously.
translation.es: y supongo que me tomo en seriohasta las festividades más raras.

translation.en: Ellie, that's enough. You'll see Auntie Jill soon enough.
translation.es: Ellie, ya basta.Pronto verás a la tía Jill.

translation.en: Adolph, would you kindly escort my daughter outside and sit with her?
translation.es: Adolph, ¿acompañarías a mi hija afueray esperarías con ella?

translation.en: Well, stop looking at me like I'm a donut and keep my daughter company!
translation.es: ¡No me mires como a una rosquillay hazle compañía a mi hija!

translation.en: Look at the clouds. There's some fascinating shapes today.
translation.es: Miren las nubes.Hoy tienen unas formas fascinantes.

translation.en: Now, let's us adults have some straight talk.
translation.es: Es hora de que los adultoshablemos en serio.

translation.en: Taft was writing a card for my competition.
I learned long ago, never let the trappings of shared DNA
translation.es: Hace mucho aprendí a no dejarque las trampas del ADN

translation.en: -All this for a fucking card? -Shut up!
Is your brother as crazy as you are?
My brother had everything handed to him.
translation.es: A mi hermano le dieron todo servido.

translation.en: The blind luck of the firstborn. But not me, Mr. Wentworth.
translation.es: La suerte del primogénito.Pero a mí no, Sr. Wentworth.

translation.en: I had to fight and claw my way for everything.
translation.es: Tuve que lucharcon uñas y dientes por todo.

translation.en: Come on, Raymond, he was your competition.
Why did you have to kill him?
what do you know about holidays?

translation.es: Los festejos nacen de la sangre.¿El Cuatro de Julio?

translation.en: Fourth of July? Nothing less than a war.
translation.es: Los festejos nacen de la sangre.¿El Cuatro de Julio? Una guerra, ni más ni menos.

translation.en: A woman goes through nine months of excruciating pregnancy,
translation.es: Una mujer pasa nueve meses tortuosamente embarazada

translation.en: and tops it off with a small human awash in her own blood.
translation.es: y lo corona con un humano diminutobañado en su propia sangre.

translation.en: And what did it take to have Christmas and Easter?
translation.es: ¿Y de dónde salieronla Navidad y las Pascuas?

translation.en: Biggest holidays of them all, the top two.
It took the greatest man who ever lived
translation.es: El hombre más grandioso de la historia

translation.en: Do you understand, Mr. Wentworth? It's all about sacrifice.
translation.es: ¿Entiende, Sr. Wentworth?Todo es cuestión de sacrificios.

translation.en: The universe cries out for sacrifice,
and I'm simply following the template.
translation.es: y yo solo sigo las instrucciones.

translation.en: when my junky nephew and Jill bore a child,
translation.es: Cuando el adicto de mi sobrinoy Jill tuvieron una hija

translation.en: I simply wanted to have the little bean brought up properly.
translation.es: quise que fuera criada de modo aceptable.

translation.en: Of course, I was foolish enough to let her stay in the child's life.
translation.es: Y cometí la tontería de dejarla ser partede la vida de la niña.

translation.en: It was a tangled web indeed,
but now I intend to clear the situation up,
translation.es: pero ahora planeo aclarar la situación

translation.en: You get the card, Jill gets the girl.
translation.es: Le doy la tarjetay Jill se queda con la niña.

translation.en: That child is going to grow up knowing herself in a higher class than she was born to.
translation.es: Esa niña crecerá siendo partede una clase superior a esa donde nació.
Después de todo, es mi heredera.

translation.en: I intend for her to have the best and be the best,
translation.es: Pienso darle lo mejor de lo mejor

translation.en: and she will never hear a whisper
translation.es: y jamás oirá ni una palabra

translation.en: of her no-account, drug addict birth father
translation.es: sobre el inútil de su padre drogadicto

translation.en: or her whore of a mother.
translation.es: o la prostituta de su madre.

translation.en: [Ray] After all that, I gave them the damn card.
translation.es: Después de todo eso,les di la maldita tarjeta.

translation.en: They found a nice, cheery front to sell it, and that did the trick.
translation.es: Encontraron una linda pantallapara venderla GANADOR DEL CONCURSO DEL "DÍA DE LA NOVIA" y funcionó perfectamente.

translation.en: Made people feel good, I guess,
translation.es: Supongo que hizo sentir bien a la gente,

translation.en: the kind of good feeling some dumb card can give you.
translation.es: como solo te puede hacer sentiruna buena tarjeta.

translation.en: I don't sell my feelings anymore, either.
translation.es: Y ya no vendo mis sentimientos.

translation.en: I'm saving 'em up for somebody special.
-What, did I do something wrong? -No, no, no. Pull up a little bit.
translation.es: ¿Acaso hice algo mal? Estaciona un momento.
